items.title: Nvidia could drastically reduce supply of RTX 5000 gaming GPUs in 2026, cutting production by up to 40%
items.description: Nvidia is reportedly planning to cut RTX 5000 series GPU production by up to 40% in 2026, raising concerns for gamers and PC builders amid ongoing supply chain shifts.

items.title: Appleâ€™s new AI tool generates 3D scenes from photos in under a second for VR memories
items.description: Apple has unveiled an AI-powered tool that transforms photos into immersive 3D VR scenes almost instantly, bringing users closer to a Star Trek-like Holodeck experience.

items.title: Ford shifts battery focus from cars to data centers with 20GWh capacity plans
items.description: Ford is redirecting battery production efforts toward data centers, aiming for massive 20GWh capacity to support AI and cloud computing demands.

items.title: DoorDash launches Zesty, an AI social app for restaurant discovery
items.description: DoorDash introduces Zesty, a generative AI app that personalizes restaurant recommendations using social trends and user data, blending discovery with social networking.

items.title: RAM crisis to impact smartphone specs in 2026 as Samsung doubles DDR5 costs
items.description: Rising DDR5 RAM costs, with Samsung reportedly doubling prices, could lead to downgraded smartphone specifications next year according to industry experts.

items.title: Google unveils Gemini 3 Flash for high-speed AI applications
items.description: Google releases Gemini 3 Flash, a lightweight AI model optimized for low-latency tasks like real-time translation and coding, reducing costs for developers.

items.title: AI-generated code contains more bugs than human output, bosses prefer human specialists
items.description: Studies show AI-generated code has higher error rates than human-written code, prompting companies to hire specialists over relying on AI tools.

items.title: Intel set to acquire AI chip specialist to catch up with AMD and Nvidia
items.description: Intel is reportedly buying an AI chip company as part of efforts to close the gap with rivals AMD and Nvidia in the competitive AI hardware market.
